name: website-monitor-testmo
description: Website monitoring solution using Playwright Test and Testmo

scripts.dashboard: node -e "const { generateDashboard } = require('./src/utils/dashboard-generator'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const results = []; const dir = path.join(__dirname, 'test-results/screenshots'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(site => { const statusPath = path.join(dir, site, 'status.json'); if (fs.existsSync(statusPath)) { try { results.push(JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(statusPath, 'utf8'))); } catch(e) {} } }); } if (results.length > 0) { generateDashboard(results.map(r => ({ name: r.name, url: r.url, isUp: r.isUp, statusCode: r.statusCode, loadTime: r.loadTime, errorMessage: r.errorMessage, errorCategory: r.errorCategory, performanceScore: r.performanceScore, performanceThreshold: r.performanceThreshold, sslInfo: r.ssl })), path.join(__dirname, 'test-results/dashboard.html')); console.log('Dashboard generated!'); } else { console.log('No results found. Run tests first.'); }"
